home.webdesc: NuxtTemplate is a starter template for startups, marketing websites & landing pages. Built with Nuxt & TailwindCSS. You can quickly create any website with this starter.
home.webfn: Everything you need to start a website
home.webfndesc: Nuxt comes batteries included. It takes the best parts of state-of-the-art tools and adds its own innovations.
home.btodesc: Static or Dynamic, the choice is yours with Nuxt's hybrid rendering modes.

about.title: Empowering the world with Nuxt.
about.subtitle: We're a multi-cultural team from around the world! We come from diverse backgrounds, bringing different personalities, experiences and skills to the job. This is what makes our team so special.

contact.creator: Contact NuxtTemplate Creator
contact.tip: Have something to say? I am here to help. Fill up the form or send email.

footer.btosub: Made by YoungDo with attribution to Web3Templates
